name: ParrotEntityHelper
description: The ParrotEntityHelper class provides specialized methods for interacting with Parrot entities in Minecraft.
overview:
Parrots are flying passive mobs that come in various colors, can mimic sounds, sit on players' shoulders, and dance to music. These colorful birds spawn naturally in jungle biomes and can be tamed with seeds, making them excellent companions with unique behaviors.

Parrots are special among Minecraft mobs for their ability to mimic nearby mob sounds, sit on player shoulders, and dance to jukebox or note block music. They can be tamed using any type of seed (grass seeds, melon seeds, pumpkin seeds, beetroot seeds, wheat seeds, or torchflower seeds), and tamed parrots will follow their owners like other tamed animals. However, parrots have the unique ability to perch on player shoulders, making them portable companions.

This helper class provides access to key parrot behaviors including their color variant, current state (sitting, flying, dancing), shoulder perching status, and all standard tameable entity functionality. The class extends TameableEntityHelper and inherits comprehensive methods for ownership management, health tracking, AI control, and other tameable animal behaviors, while adding parrot-specific functionality.

methods.name: getVariant
methods.description: Returns the color variant of this parrot. Parrots come in 5 different color variants that affect their appearance but don't affect gameplay mechanics. Returns one of: "minecraft:red", "minecraft:blue", "minecraft:green", "minecraft:cyan", "minecraft:gray".

methods.name: isSitting
methods.description: Returns whether this parrot is currently in a sitting pose. Parrots can sit when commanded by their owner or when they land on the ground after flying.

methods.name: isFlying
methods.description: Returns whether this parrot is currently flying. Parrots fly when moving between locations, escaping threats, or following their owner.

methods.name: isPartying
methods.description: Returns whether this parrot is currently dancing to music. Parrots dance when they hear music from jukeboxes or note blocks within a certain range.

methods.name: isStanding
methods.description: Returns whether this parrot is currently standing still. This method returns `true` when the parrot is neither sitting, flying, nor dancing - essentially when it's just standing on the ground in a neutral state.

methods.name: isSittingOnShoulder
methods.description: Returns whether this parrot is currently perched on any player's shoulder. Tamed parrots can sit on player shoulders, making them portable companions.
